title: Snapchat
alt: For obvious reasons, the prize is awarded at a different time of year from the others, while it's still fresh in the committee's memory.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan standing together. He holds a smartphone in his left hand and looks at it.]
Cueball: Oh, the Pulitzer Prize for Snapchat was just awarded.
Megan: Yeah.
Megan: I hear the photo was really good.
Cueball: Aw, maaaan...
